sentences.sContent: After the war many soldiers stayed in France.
sentences.sCn: 战后，许多士兵留在法国。

sentences.sContent: I go swimming every day after work.
sentences.sCn: 我每天下班后都去游泳。

sentences.sContent: Do you believe in life after death?
sentences.sCn: 你相信人死后还有来生吗？

sentences.sContent: The first attack started just after midnight.
sentences.sCn: 刚过午夜，第一波进攻开始了。

sentences.sContent: David went to bed straight after (=  immediately after  ) supper.
sentences.sCn: 戴维一吃完晚饭就去睡觉了。

sentences.sContent: After you’d called the police, what did you do?
sentences.sCn: 报警之后，你做了些什么？

sentences.sContent: Zimmerman changed his name after he left Germany.
sentences.sCn: 齐默尔曼离开德国后改了名字。

sentences.sContent: People still remember the 1958 revolution and what came after (=  happened after it  ) .
sentences.sCn: 人们依然记得1958年的那场革命和之后发生的事。

sentences.sContent: ...They also had talk therapy with a nurse before and after quit day...
...Moses spent three hours looking after the bees and was stung five times...
...only after the Yangtze River and the Yellow River...
...noticed a “brown patch” on the back of the car after the owner parked it to do some shopping...
...Veiseh began to remember the details of his everyday experiences after he met his first young love...
...Thousands of bees left a town after landing on the back of a car when their queen got stuck in its boot...
...you probably go through that process after a big event like your wedding day...
...The Blessing and Curse of the People Who Never Forget  A handful of people can recall almost every day of their lives in enormous detail—and after years of research...
...I could tell you everything about every day after that...
...the scientist confirmed the snake was a previously unknown species after conducting a genetic analysis of tissue samples...

words.tran: 最后的；最后部的；最靠近船尾的

trans.tranOther: when a particular event or time has happened, or when someone has done something
